11#define HID_EP_SZ 0x10

13#define HID_INTERVAL 2

26enum HidReportId {
27 ReportIdKeyboard = 1,
28 ReportIdMouse = 2,
29 ReportIdConsumer = 3,
30};

32/* HID report descriptor: keyboard + mouse + consumer control */
33static const uint8_t hid_report_desc[] = {
34 // clang-format off
35 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_PAGE_DESKTOP),
36 HID_USAGE(HID_DESKTOP_KEYBOARD),
37 HID_COLLECTION(HID_APPLICATION_COLLECTION),
38 HID_REPORT_ID(ReportIdKeyboard),
39 // Keyboard report
40 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_DESKTOP_KEYPAD),
41 HID_USAGE_MINIMUM(HID_KEYBOARD_L_CTRL),
42 HID_USAGE_MAXIMUM(HID_KEYBOARD_R_GUI),
43 HID_LOGICAL_MINIMUM(0),
44 HID_LOGICAL_MAXIMUM(1),
45 HID_REPORT_SIZE(1),
46 HID_REPORT_COUNT(8),
47 // Input - Modifier keys byte
48 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_DATA | HID_IOF_VARIABLE | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
49
50 HID_REPORT_COUNT(1),
51 HID_REPORT_SIZE(8),
52 // Input - Reserved byte
53 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_CONSTANT | HID_IOF_VARIABLE | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
54
55 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_PAGE_LED),
56 HID_REPORT_COUNT(8),
57 HID_REPORT_SIZE(1),
58 HID_USAGE_MINIMUM(1),
59 HID_USAGE_MAXIMUM(8),
60 // Output - LEDs
61 HID_OUTPUT(HID_IOF_DATA | HID_IOF_VARIABLE | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
62
63 HID_REPORT_COUNT(HID_KB_MAX_KEYS),
64 HID_REPORT_SIZE(8),
65 HID_LOGICAL_MINIMUM(0),
66 HID_LOGICAL_MAXIMUM(101),
67 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_DESKTOP_KEYPAD),
68 HID_USAGE_MINIMUM(0),
69 HID_USAGE_MAXIMUM(101),
70 // Input - Key codes
71 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_DATA | HID_IOF_ARRAY | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
72 HID_END_COLLECTION,
73
74 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_PAGE_DESKTOP),
75 HID_USAGE(HID_DESKTOP_MOUSE),
76 HID_COLLECTION(HID_APPLICATION_COLLECTION),
77 HID_USAGE(HID_DESKTOP_POINTER),
78 HID_COLLECTION(HID_PHYSICAL_COLLECTION),
79 HID_REPORT_ID(ReportIdMouse),
80 // Mouse report
81 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_PAGE_BUTTON),
82 HID_USAGE_MINIMUM(1),
83 HID_USAGE_MAXIMUM(3),
84 HID_LOGICAL_MINIMUM(0),
85 HID_LOGICAL_MAXIMUM(1),
86 HID_REPORT_COUNT(3),
87 HID_REPORT_SIZE(1),
88 // Input - Mouse keys
89 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_DATA | HID_IOF_VARIABLE | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
90
91 HID_REPORT_SIZE(1),
92 HID_REPORT_COUNT(5),
93 // Input - Mouse keys padding
94 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_CONSTANT | HID_IOF_VARIABLE | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
95
96 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_PAGE_DESKTOP),
97 HID_USAGE(HID_DESKTOP_X),
98 HID_USAGE(HID_DESKTOP_Y),
99 HID_USAGE(HID_DESKTOP_WHEEL),
100 HID_LOGICAL_MINIMUM(-127),
101 HID_LOGICAL_MAXIMUM(127),
102 HID_REPORT_SIZE(8),
103 HID_REPORT_COUNT(3),
104 // Input - Mouse movement data (x, y, scroll)
105 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_DATA | HID_IOF_VARIABLE | HID_IOF_RELATIVE),
106 HID_END_COLLECTION,
107 HID_END_COLLECTION,
108
109 HID_USAGE_PAGE(HID_PAGE_CONSUMER),
110 HID_USAGE(HID_CONSUMER_CONTROL),
111 HID_COLLECTION(HID_APPLICATION_COLLECTION),
112 HID_REPORT_ID(ReportIdConsumer),
113 // Consumer report
114 HID_LOGICAL_MINIMUM(0),
115 HID_RI_LOGICAL_MAXIMUM(16, 0x3FF),
116 HID_USAGE_MINIMUM(0),
117 HID_RI_USAGE_MAXIMUM(16, 0x3FF),
118 HID_REPORT_COUNT(HID_CONSUMER_MAX_KEYS),
119 HID_REPORT_SIZE(16),
120 // Input - Consumer control keys
121 HID_INPUT(HID_IOF_DATA | HID_IOF_ARRAY | HID_IOF_ABSOLUTE),
122 HID_END_COLLECTION,
123 // clang-format on
124};

126/* Device descriptor */
127static struct usb_device_descriptor hid_device_desc = {
128 .bLength = sizeof(struct usb_device_descriptor),
129 .bDescriptorType = USB_DTYPE_DEVICE,
130 .bcdUSB = VERSION_BCD(2, 0, 0),
131 .bDeviceClass = USB_CLASS_PER_INTERFACE,
132 .bDeviceSubClass = USB_SUBCLASS_NONE,
133 .bDeviceProtocol = USB_PROTO_NONE,
134 .bMaxPacketSize0 = USB_EP0_SIZE,
135 .idVendor = HID_VID_DEFAULT,
136 .idProduct = HID_PID_DEFAULT,
137 .bcdDevice = VERSION_BCD(1, 0, 0),
138 .iManufacturer = 0,
139 .iProduct = 0,
140 .iSerialNumber = 0,
141 .bNumConfigurations = 1,
142};
143
144/* Device configuration descriptor */
145static const struct HidConfigDescriptor hid_cfg_desc = {
146 .config =
147 {
148 .bLength = sizeof(struct usb_config_descriptor),
149 .bDescriptorType = USB_DTYPE_CONFIGURATION,
150 .wTotalLength = sizeof(struct HidConfigDescriptor),
151 .bNumInterfaces = 1,
152 .bConfigurationValue = 1,
153 .iConfiguration = NO_DESCRIPTOR,
154 .bmAttributes = USB_CFG_ATTR_RESERVED | USB_CFG_ATTR_SELFPOWERED,
155 .bMaxPower = USB_CFG_POWER_MA(100),
156 },
157 .intf_0 =
158 {
159 .hid =
160 {
161 .bLength = sizeof(struct usb_interface_descriptor),
162 .bDescriptorType = USB_DTYPE_INTERFACE,
163 .bInterfaceNumber = 0,
164 .bAlternateSetting = 0,
165 .bNumEndpoints = 1,
166 .bInterfaceClass = USB_CLASS_HID,
167 .bInterfaceSubClass = USB_HID_SUBCLASS_BOOT,
168 .bInterfaceProtocol = USB_HID_PROTO_KEYBOARD,
169 .iInterface = NO_DESCRIPTOR,
170 },
171 .hid_desc =
172 {
173 .bLength = sizeof(struct usb_hid_descriptor),
174 .bDescriptorType = USB_DTYPE_HID,
175 .bcdHID = VERSION_BCD(1, 0, 0),
176 .bCountryCode = USB_HID_COUNTRY_NONE,
177 .bNumDescriptors = 1,
178 .bDescriptorType0 = USB_DTYPE_HID_REPORT,
179 .wDescriptorLength0 = sizeof(hid_report_desc),
180 },
181 .hid_ep_in =
182 {
183 .bLength = sizeof(struct usb_endpoint_descriptor),
184 .bDescriptorType = USB_DTYPE_ENDPOINT,
185 .bEndpointAddress = HID_EP_IN,
186 .bmAttributes = USB_EPTYPE_INTERRUPT,
187 .wMaxPacketSize = HID_EP_SZ,
188 .bInterval = HID_INTERVAL,
189 },
190 },
191};

193struct HidReportMouse {
194 uint8_t report_id;
195 uint8_t btn;
196 int8_t x;
197 int8_t y;
198 int8_t wheel;
199} __attribute__((packed));

201struct HidReportKB {
202 uint8_t report_id;
203 struct {
204 uint8_t mods;
205 uint8_t reserved;
206 uint8_t btn[HID_KB_MAX_KEYS];
207 } boot;
208} __attribute__((packed));
209
210struct HidReportConsumer {
211 uint8_t report_id;
212 uint16_t btn[HID_CONSUMER_MAX_KEYS];
213} __attribute__((packed));
214
215struct HidReportLED {
216 uint8_t report_id;
217 uint8_t led_state;
218} __attribute__((packed));
219
220static struct HidReport {
221 struct HidReportKB keyboard;
222 struct HidReportMouse mouse;
223 struct HidReportConsumer consumer;
224} __attribute__((packed)) hid_report;

226static void hid_init(usbd_device* dev, FuriHalUsbInterface* intf, void* ctx);
227static void hid_deinit(usbd_device* dev);
228static void hid_on_wakeup(usbd_device* dev);
229static void hid_on_suspend(usbd_device* dev);

231FuriHalUsbInterface usb_hid = {
232 .init = hid_init,
233 .deinit = hid_deinit,
234 .wakeup = hid_on_wakeup,
235 .suspend = hid_on_suspend,
236
237 .dev_descr = (struct usb_device_descriptor*)&hid_device_desc,
238
239 .str_manuf_descr = NULL,
240 .str_prod_descr = NULL,
241 .str_serial_descr = NULL,
242
243 .cfg_descr = (void*)&hid_cfg_desc,
244};

246static bool hid_send_report(uint8_t report_id);
247static usbd_respond hid_ep_config(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t cfg);
248static usbd_respond hid_control(usbd_device* dev, usbd_ctlreq* req, usbd_rqc_callback* callback);
249static usbd_device* usb_dev;
250static FuriSemaphore* hid_semaphore = NULL;
251static bool hid_connected = false;
252static HidStateCallback callback;
253static void* cb_ctx;
254static uint8_t led_state;
255static bool boot_protocol = false;
256
257bool furi_hal_hid_is_connected() {
258 return hid_connected;
259}
260
261uint8_t furi_hal_hid_get_led_state() {
262 return led_state;
263}
264
265void furi_hal_hid_set_state_callback(HidStateCallback cb, void* ctx) {
266 if(callback != NULL) {
267 if(hid_connected == true) callback(false, cb_ctx);
268 }
269
270 callback = cb;
271 cb_ctx = ctx;
272
273 if(callback != NULL) {
274 if(hid_connected == true) callback(true, cb_ctx);
275 }
276}
277
278bool furi_hal_hid_kb_press(uint16_t button) {
279 for(uint8_t key_nb = 0; key_nb < HID_KB_MAX_KEYS; key_nb++) {
280 if(hid_report.keyboard.boot.btn[key_nb] == 0) {
281 hid_report.keyboard.boot.btn[key_nb] = button & 0xFF;
282 break;
283 }
284 }
285 hid_report.keyboard.boot.mods |= (button >> 8);
286 return hid_send_report(ReportIdKeyboard);
287}
288
289bool furi_hal_hid_kb_release(uint16_t button) {
290 for(uint8_t key_nb = 0; key_nb < HID_KB_MAX_KEYS; key_nb++) {
291 if(hid_report.keyboard.boot.btn[key_nb] == (button & 0xFF)) {
292 hid_report.keyboard.boot.btn[key_nb] = 0;
293 break;
294 }
295 }
296 hid_report.keyboard.boot.mods &= ~(button >> 8);
297 return hid_send_report(ReportIdKeyboard);
298}
299
300bool furi_hal_hid_kb_release_all() {
301 for(uint8_t key_nb = 0; key_nb < HID_KB_MAX_KEYS; key_nb++) {
302 hid_report.keyboard.boot.btn[key_nb] = 0;
303 }
304 hid_report.keyboard.boot.mods = 0;
305 return hid_send_report(ReportIdKeyboard);
306}
307
308bool furi_hal_hid_mouse_move(int8_t dx, int8_t dy) {
309 hid_report.mouse.x = dx;
310 hid_report.mouse.y = dy;
311 bool state = hid_send_report(ReportIdMouse);
312 hid_report.mouse.x = 0;
313 hid_report.mouse.y = 0;
314 return state;
315}
316
317bool furi_hal_hid_mouse_press(uint8_t button) {
318 hid_report.mouse.btn |= button;
319 return hid_send_report(ReportIdMouse);
320}
321
322bool furi_hal_hid_mouse_release(uint8_t button) {
323 hid_report.mouse.btn &= ~button;
324 return hid_send_report(ReportIdMouse);
325}
326
327bool furi_hal_hid_mouse_scroll(int8_t delta) {
328 hid_report.mouse.wheel = delta;
329 bool state = hid_send_report(ReportIdMouse);
330 hid_report.mouse.wheel = 0;
331 return state;
332}
333
334bool furi_hal_hid_consumer_key_press(uint16_t button) {
335 for(uint8_t key_nb = 0; key_nb < HID_CONSUMER_MAX_KEYS; key_nb++) {
336 if(hid_report.consumer.btn[key_nb] == 0) {
337 hid_report.consumer.btn[key_nb] = button;
338 break;
339 }
340 }
341 return hid_send_report(ReportIdConsumer);
342}
343
344bool furi_hal_hid_consumer_key_release(uint16_t button) {
345 for(uint8_t key_nb = 0; key_nb < HID_CONSUMER_MAX_KEYS; key_nb++) {
346 if(hid_report.consumer.btn[key_nb] == button) {
347 hid_report.consumer.btn[key_nb] = 0;
348 break;
349 }
350 }
351 return hid_send_report(ReportIdConsumer);
352}
353
354static void* hid_set_string_descr(char* str) {
355 furi_assert(str);
356
357 size_t len = strlen(str);
358 struct usb_string_descriptor* dev_str_desc = malloc(len * 2 + 2);
359 dev_str_desc->bLength = len * 2 + 2;
360 dev_str_desc->bDescriptorType = USB_DTYPE_STRING;
361 for(size_t i = 0; i < len; i++) dev_str_desc->wString[i] = str[i];
362
363 return dev_str_desc;
364}
365
366static void hid_init(usbd_device* dev, FuriHalUsbInterface* intf, void* ctx) {
367 UNUSED(intf);
368 FuriHalUsbHidConfig* cfg = (FuriHalUsbHidConfig*)ctx;
369 if(hid_semaphore == NULL) hid_semaphore = furi_semaphore_alloc(1, 1);
370 usb_dev = dev;
371 hid_report.keyboard.report_id = ReportIdKeyboard;
372 hid_report.mouse.report_id = ReportIdMouse;
373 hid_report.consumer.report_id = ReportIdConsumer;
374
375 usb_hid.dev_descr->iManufacturer = 0;
376 usb_hid.dev_descr->iProduct = 0;
377 usb_hid.str_manuf_descr = NULL;
378 usb_hid.str_prod_descr = NULL;
379 usb_hid.dev_descr->idVendor = HID_VID_DEFAULT;
380 usb_hid.dev_descr->idProduct = HID_PID_DEFAULT;
381
382 if(cfg != NULL) {
383 usb_hid.dev_descr->idVendor = cfg->vid;
384 usb_hid.dev_descr->idProduct = cfg->pid;
385
386 if(cfg->manuf[0] != '\0') {
387 usb_hid.str_manuf_descr = hid_set_string_descr(cfg->manuf);
388 usb_hid.dev_descr->iManufacturer = UsbDevManuf;
389 }
390
391 if(cfg->product[0] != '\0') {
392 usb_hid.str_prod_descr = hid_set_string_descr(cfg->product);
393 usb_hid.dev_descr->iProduct = UsbDevProduct;
394 }
395 }
396
397 usbd_reg_config(dev, hid_ep_config);
398 usbd_reg_control(dev, hid_control);
399
400 usbd_connect(dev, true);
401}
402
403static void hid_deinit(usbd_device* dev) {
404 usbd_reg_config(dev, NULL);
405 usbd_reg_control(dev, NULL);
406
407 free(usb_hid.str_manuf_descr);
408 free(usb_hid.str_prod_descr);
409}
410
411static void hid_on_wakeup(usbd_device* dev) {
412 UNUSED(dev);
413 if(!hid_connected) {
414 hid_connected = true;
415 if(callback != NULL) {
416 callback(true, cb_ctx);
417 }
418 }
419}
420
421static void hid_on_suspend(usbd_device* dev) {
422 UNUSED(dev);
423 if(hid_connected) {
424 hid_connected = false;
425 furi_semaphore_release(hid_semaphore);
426 if(callback != NULL) {
427 callback(false, cb_ctx);
428 }
429 }
430}
431
432static bool hid_send_report(uint8_t report_id) {
433 if((hid_semaphore == NULL) || (hid_connected == false)) return false;
434 if((boot_protocol == true) && (report_id != ReportIdKeyboard)) return false;
435
436 FuriStatus status = furi_semaphore_acquire(hid_semaphore, HID_INTERVAL * 2);
437 if(status == FuriStatusErrorTimeout) {
438 return false;
439 }
440 furi_check(status == FuriStatusOk);
441 if(hid_connected == false) {
442 return false;
443 }
444 if(boot_protocol == true) {
445 usbd_ep_write(
446 usb_dev, HID_EP_IN, &hid_report.keyboard.boot, sizeof(hid_report.keyboard.boot));
447 } else {
448 if(report_id == ReportIdKeyboard)
449 usbd_ep_write(usb_dev, HID_EP_IN, &hid_report.keyboard, sizeof(hid_report.keyboard));
450 else if(report_id == ReportIdMouse)
451 usbd_ep_write(usb_dev, HID_EP_IN, &hid_report.mouse, sizeof(hid_report.mouse));
452 else if(report_id == ReportIdConsumer)
453 usbd_ep_write(usb_dev, HID_EP_IN, &hid_report.consumer, sizeof(hid_report.consumer));
454 }
455 return true;
456}
457
458static void hid_txrx_ep_callback(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t event, uint8_t ep) {
459 UNUSED(dev);
460 if(event == usbd_evt_eptx) {
461 furi_semaphore_release(hid_semaphore);
462 } else if(boot_protocol == true) {
463 usbd_ep_read(usb_dev, ep, &led_state, sizeof(led_state));
464 } else {
465 struct HidReportLED leds;
466 usbd_ep_read(usb_dev, ep, &leds, sizeof(leds));
467 led_state = leds.led_state;
468 }
469}
470
471/* Configure endpoints */
472static usbd_respond hid_ep_config(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t cfg) {
473 switch(cfg) {
474 case 0:
475 /* deconfiguring device */
476 usbd_ep_deconfig(dev, HID_EP_IN);
477 usbd_reg_endpoint(dev, HID_EP_IN, 0);
478 return usbd_ack;
479 case 1:
480 /* configuring device */
481 usbd_ep_config(dev, HID_EP_IN, USB_EPTYPE_INTERRUPT, HID_EP_SZ);
482 usbd_reg_endpoint(dev, HID_EP_IN, hid_txrx_ep_callback);
483 usbd_ep_write(dev, HID_EP_IN, 0, 0);
484 boot_protocol = false; /* BIOS will SET_PROTOCOL if it wants this */
485 return usbd_ack;
486 default:
487 return usbd_fail;
488 }
489}
490
491/* Control requests handler */
492static usbd_respond hid_control(usbd_device* dev, usbd_ctlreq* req, usbd_rqc_callback* callback) {
493 UNUSED(callback);
494 /* HID control requests */
495 if(((USB_REQ_RECIPIENT | USB_REQ_TYPE) & req->bmRequestType) ==
496 (USB_REQ_INTERFACE | USB_REQ_CLASS) &&
497 req->wIndex == 0) {
498 switch(req->bRequest) {
499 case USB_HID_SETIDLE:
500 return usbd_ack;
501 case USB_HID_GETREPORT:
502 if(boot_protocol == true) {
503 dev->status.data_ptr = &hid_report.keyboard.boot;
504 dev->status.data_count = sizeof(hid_report.keyboard.boot);
505 } else {
506 dev->status.data_ptr = &hid_report;
507 dev->status.data_count = sizeof(hid_report);
508 }
509 return usbd_ack;
510 case USB_HID_SETPROTOCOL:
511 if(req->wValue == 0)
512 boot_protocol = true;
513 else if(req->wValue == 1)
514 boot_protocol = false;
515 else
516 return usbd_fail;
517 return usbd_ack;
518 default:
519 return usbd_fail;
520 }
521 }
522 if(((USB_REQ_RECIPIENT | USB_REQ_TYPE) & req->bmRequestType) ==
523 (USB_REQ_INTERFACE | USB_REQ_STANDARD) &&
524 req->wIndex == 0 && req->bRequest == USB_STD_GET_DESCRIPTOR) {
525 switch(req->wValue >> 8) {
526 case USB_DTYPE_HID:
527 dev->status.data_ptr = (uint8_t*)&(hid_cfg_desc.intf_0.hid_desc);
528 dev->status.data_count = sizeof(hid_cfg_desc.intf_0.hid_desc);
529 return usbd_ack;
530 case USB_DTYPE_HID_REPORT:
531 boot_protocol = false; /* BIOS does not read this */
532 dev->status.data_ptr = (uint8_t*)hid_report_desc;
533 dev->status.data_count = sizeof(hid_report_desc);
534 return usbd_ack;
535 default:
536 return usbd_fail;
537 }
538 }
539 return usbd_fail;
540}
